thread.section_title: Redspot Car Rentals Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Redspot Car Rentals | redspot.com.au | 3 of 699
thread.title: YAKUP
thread.title_full: Redspot Car Rentals reviewed by YAKUP

author: YAKUP
title: YAKUP
text: We spoke to redspot and were told it was okay to use the master card for the bond of someone other than the driver then when we got there because our driver did not have a master card we were forced to pay $700 for the week because of the young driver fees, rather than the $380 of what we originally were promised...
